## \_IStringPlaceholder interface

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IStringPlaceholder
```

## Properties

| Property                                                                               | Modifiers | Type                      | Description                                                     |
| -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [locFilePath](./webpack5-localization-plugin._istringplaceholder.locfilepath.md)       |           | string                    | The key used to identify the source file containing the string. |
| [stringName](./webpack5-localization-plugin._istringplaceholder.stringname.md)         |           | string                    | The identifier of the string within its original source file.   |
| [suffix](./webpack5-localization-plugin._istringplaceholder.suffix.md)                 |           | string                    | The identifier for this particular placeholder, for lookup.     |
| [value](./webpack5-localization-plugin._istringplaceholder.value.md)                   |           | string                    | The literal string that will be injected for later replacement. |
| [valuesByLocale](./webpack5-localization-plugin._istringplaceholder.valuesbylocale.md) |           | Map&lt;string, string&gt; | The values of this string in each output locale.                |
